attributes.action: station road, polmont, road safety measures for speeding and usafe driving.
attributes.additional_details: Station road, Polmont has many people crossing daily to shops, schools, nursery, hair dressers, bus ect.... They cross a road with no crossing path with cars moving at high speeds in a 30mph zone. Something needs to be done about the safety of all age of people. A crossing and speed cameras need to be installed.

rejection.details: This is a matter for the Scottish Government.
